Scripts.OnValueChanged:
if (not BWP_Hide) then BWP_Hide = {} end if(not BWP_Hide.Undocked) then BWP_Hide.BWPButtonPosition = LocationSliderOptionSlider:GetValue()
if(BWPButton_UpdatePosition) then BWPButton_UpdatePosition() end end

FontString.name: $parentTitle
FontString.text: Distance From Destination for Arrived Message

Scripts.OnValueChanged:
if (not BWP_Hide) then BWP_Hide = {} end
BWP_Hide.ClearDistance = DistanceSliderOptionSlider:GetValue()

Scripts.OnClick: if(not BWP_Hide) then BWP_Hide = {} end if(this:GetChecked()) then BWP_Hide.Destination = nil elseif (not this:GetChecked())then BWP_Hide.Destination = 1 end
if(not BWPOption) then BWPOptions = {} end if(this:GetChecked()) then BWP_Hide.WarningDisplayed = 1 elseif (not this:GetChecked())then BWP_Hide.WarningDisplayed = nil end

if(not BWP_Hide) then BWP_Hide = {} end if(this:GetChecked()) then BWP_Hide.Distance = nil if(MapLibrary) then BWP_Hide.Yards = 1 end DistDisplayCheckOption_Yards:SetChecked(0) elseif (not this:GetChecked()) then BWP_Hide.Distance = 1 end

if(not BWP_Hide) then BWP_Hide = {} end if(this:GetChecked()) then BWP_Hide.Distance= nil BWP_Hide.Yards = nil DistDisplayCheckOption:SetChecked(0) elseif (not this:GetChecked()) then BWP_Hide.Distance = 1 end
